entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Flurries early in the morning. Snow level rising to 1000 metres in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain showers and flurries changing to flurries after midnight. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom late in the evening. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023
